next_steps.step: Despite strong opportunity quality, proactively showcase additional value to the customer to address concerns related to potentially lower past sales and enhance perception.

Increase targeted customer interactions, focusing on addressing their specific needs and pain points to demonstrate commitment and build stronger relationships, counteracting the negative impact of cust_interactions.
Leverage Schneider Electric's existing engagement and expertise in Iberia to directly address competitive threats and reinforce our unique value proposition within the region.
